New Records: José Ramírez was intentionally walked for a franchise-record 88th time.
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and José Ramírez hit back-to-back homers in the eighth inning.
Joey Cantillo pitched five scoreless innings.
Josh Naylor had a two-RBI single in the sixth inning.
Junior Caminero had a career-high three doubles for the Rays.
Lane Thomas threw out Josh Lowe at home in the fifth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Lane Thomas emphasized the importance of having fun and aggressive at-bats.
Taylor Walls praised Junior Caminero's potential and future career.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians remained three games ahead of second-place Kansas City in the division with 13 games remaining.
Cleveland has the best home record in the AL at 44-27.
Tampa Bay is 5 1/2 games out of the final AL wild-card berth.
